ing: 1 3/4 cups SwansonÂ® Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Certified Organic Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Natural GoodnessÂ® Chicken Broth
1/2 pound bulk pork sausage, cooked and crumbled
2 cups Pepperidge FarmÂ® Herb Seasoned Stuffing
2 cups Pepperidge FarmÂ® Corn Bread Stuffing
des: "Can't decide what kind of stuffing to make?  Try this recipe...it's very easy to prepare, loaded with great flavor and goes from stovetop to table in just 25 minutes!"
ins:
Heat the broth, celery, onion and apples in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil. Reduce the heat to low. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until the vegetables and apples are tender.
Add the sausage and stuffing and stir lightly to coat.
